name: Happy New Year Simulator Thingy
description:
You are the pyrotechnician of a small village and, when midnight strikes, it's your job to light up the sky and put up a good show to the community.

HOW TO PLAY: Use Mouse or Spacebar to launch Fireworks;

Created by Samuel Sousa

Audio Credit:
Bonson / A Sound Effect; Tovusound / A Sound Effect; Doom Drones / SoundMorph;
SoundDogs / Pond5; TibaSound / Pond5.
